      • extend_arr

        public static <T> java.util.Vector<T>[] extend_arr(java.util.Vector<T>[] arr,
                                                   int sz,
                                                   int empty_not_null_sz,
                                                   int clone)
        Parameters:
        clone -
        • 2 to deep clone (clone all elements within all vectors). Elements must extend ScCloneable.
        • 1 to clone vectors themselves
        • 0 to copy vector references
        empty_not_null_sz - -1 to create null elements, $n$ to create empty vectors with $n$ capacity.

      • extend_arr
